page.title: 01DINEDOR CAMP 1
page.content: Dinedor Camp was originally an{Iron {Age hill fort.} It covers approximately ten acres, and rises about 400 feet above the surrounding countryside. It is quite separate from the other hills surrounding the city of{Hereford}and can be seen quite clearly whichever way you approach it. The Iron Age men who made their home on it chose the best place in the neighbourhood to live as they had a very good view all around. There is only one path up to the top now, and some of the earth ramparts that the people who lived there built can still be seen.
